name: Bullet Cat
description:
“First Catformer game in the history of mankind” - Catmopolitan

“Rocket-jump redefined!” - The Meow Street Journal

“100% scientifically accurrate solution of Schrödinger’s cat paradox” - Vanity Fur

Purrhaps you want to play as heavy weaponized cube-shaped cat? Aim your bazooka, destroy obstacles and use rocket jump to move around levels!

- Unlock 100 exciting levels in 5 unique worlds with your own gameplay strategy.
- High-quality beautiful graphics and simple, responsive controls.
- Fantastic slow motion feature. Everything looks better in slow motion!
- Cute cat character.
- Easy to learn, difficult to master. Only 1% of players collect all stars.
